title: Cooking in Video Games
description: Cooking has been a valuable feature in various video games. The effects, however, vary drastically.
content: BackgroundFrom survial to horror to action adventure, cooking with various ingredients is often the key to regain health and energy.test

title: Cooking can be easy
description: The only essential thing is a working kitchen machine.
content: Cooking can be easyWith the right equipmentAnd this is how to do it:All you need is a working kitchen machine!
